医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
ACA 招生平台因涉嫌外国获取消费者数据而被暂停由于怀疑印度可能会获取美国消费者的个人信息，监管机构于 8 月份突然禁止两家大型私营部门注册网站访问《平价医疗法案》市场。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/ACA-enrollment-platforms-suspended-over-alleged-foreign-access-to-consumer-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/ACA-enrollment-platforms-suspended-over-alleged-foreign-access-to-consumer-data.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=812df04e-a481-4bc2-a2e7-a84534cf7d74 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 07:21:24 -0400 ACA enrollment platforms suspended over alleged foreign access to consumer data
出生后不久肠道中就存在天然益生菌关于新生儿肠道微生物群的研究结果揭示了驱动微生物组组装的关键双歧杆菌物种及其开发个性化益生菌的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Natural-probiotic-present-in-gut-shortly-after-birth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Natural-probiotic-present-in-gut-shortly-after-birth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd0dbdba-2a6d-48b0-878c-eb3acc0a0844 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 06:59:00 -0400 Natural probiotic present in gut shortly after birth
与根茎类蔬菜和南瓜类蔬菜相比，西兰花等十字花科蔬菜可降低血压每日摄入十字花科蔬菜可显着降低轻度高血压成人的血压，凸显其对心血管健康的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Cruciferous-vegetables-like-broccoli-reduce-blood-Pressure-compared-to-root-and-squash-vegetables.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Cruciferous-vegetables-like-broccoli-reduce-blood-Pressure-compared-to-root-and-squash-vegetables.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d16db4a-8662-415a-81dd-190aba5894f1 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 05:56:00 -0400 Cruciferous vegetables like broccoli reduce blood pressure compared to root and squash vegetables
专家调查揭示了天气和气候对死亡率的健康影响被低估该研究分析了专家对气候对死亡率影响的看法，将天气危害与健康结果联系起来，并强调了紧急预防策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Expert-survey-unveils-underestimated-health-impacts-of-weather-and-climate-on-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Expert-survey-unveils-underestimated-health-impacts-of-weather-and-climate-on-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96ce4afd-8137-4490-a75c-f96fc6cf0142 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 05:15:00 -0400 Expert survey unveils underestimated health impacts of weather and climate on mortality
研究表明，橄榄油生产的副产品有望预防心血管疾病一项研究表明，富含羟基酪醇的橄榄油废水提取物有望通过抗氧化特性预防心血管疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/By-products-from-olive-oil-product-show-promise-for-preventing-cardioangio-disease-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/By-products-from-olive-oil-product-show-promise-for-preventing-cardioangio-disease-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91ae96f0-733e-4caf-be2e-9edca8e06faa Tue, 10 Sep 2024 04:44:00 -0400 By-products from olive oil production show promise for preventing cardiovascular disease, study shows
研究发现夜间光照与阿尔茨海默病风险增加之间存在联系较高的夜间光强度与阿尔茨海默病患病率增加相关，这表明光污染可能会影响神经退行性风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Study-finds-link- Between-nighttime-light-exposure-and-increased-Alzheimers-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Study-finds-link- Between-nighttime-light-exposure-and-increased-Alzheimers-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ffe78f5-19c2-4adb-9891-62bfa57e4c86 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 04:10:00 -0400 Study finds link between nighttime light exposure and increased Alzheimer's disease risk
怀孕期间摄入高亚油酸可能会损害胎儿生长并增加肥胖风险怀孕期间母亲摄入大量亚油酸可能会影响胎儿发育并增加后代肥胖和炎症的风险。然而，需要更多的研究来充分了解这些对人类的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/High-linoleic-acid-intake-during-pregnancy-may-harm-fetal-growth-and-raise-obesity-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/High-linoleic-acid-intake-during-pregnancy-may-harm-fetal-growth-and-raise-obesity-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54361a78-4648-4203-94a1-8ca1b579fde8 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 00:44:00 -0400 High linoleic acid intake during pregnancy may harm fetal growth and raise obesity risk
研究揭示了 SARS-CoV-2 抗体的全人群免疫设定点研究人员发现，无论个人疫苗接种或感染史如何，多米尼加共和国的 SARS-CoV-2 抗体水平都趋于全民免疫设定点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Study-reveals-population-wide-immune-setpoint-for-SARS-CoV-2-antibodies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240910/Study-reveals-population-wide-immune-setpoint-for-SARS-CoV-2-antibodies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f74f2ab5-3111-4d16-8d74-f8c657df77d3 Tue, 10 Sep 2024 00:07:00 -0400 Study reveals population-wide immune setpoint for SARS-CoV-2 antibodies
流行病压力促使年轻人转向大麻研究探讨了 COVID-19 大流行如何影响年轻人大麻使用的增加，强调了应对机制中的关键性别差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Pandemic-stress-drove-young-adults-to-turn-to-cannabis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Pandemic-stress-drove-young-adults-to-turn-to-cannabis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=699b3e7b-97b6-4012-98de-934671f6a288 Mon, 09 Sep 2024 23:15:00 -0400 Pandemic stress drove young adults to turn to cannabis
发现针对有健康问题的老年人接种 RSV 疫苗具有成本效益根据一项新的模型研究，针对有潜在健康问题的老年人进行呼吸道合胞病毒 (RSV) 疫苗接种计划是一种具有成本效益的减少疾病的方法 https://www.cmaj.ca/lookup/doi/10.1503/cmaj .240452（CMAJ）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Targeted-RSV-vaccination-for-older-adults-with-health-conditions-found-cost-efficient.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240909/Targeted-RSV-vaccination-for-older-adults-with-health-conditions-found-cost-efficient.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2abb0e9f-6bfc-4afc-a410-ece4b08d215e Mon, 09 Sep 2024 23:11:17 -0400 Targeted RSV vaccination for older adults with health conditions found cost-effective
